translation.en: -[meowing] -♪ No matter what we wear ♪ ♪ We're gonna be right there ♪
translation.it: Qualsiasi cosa indossiamo Siamo sempre pronte

translation.en: -♪ Jump to it, jump to it ♪ -[Charm Alarms chirping]
♪ So let's suit up And save the day ♪
♪ Gowns and crowns are always fun, And when it's time to get things done ♪
translation.it: Abiti e corone sono uno spasso Ma se c'è da intervenire

translation.en: -♪ Princesses wear pants! ♪ -♪ Yeah! ♪
-♪ Let's go! ♪ -♪ Glide or sail, or hop a plane ♪
translation.it: Principesse in pantaloni! Sì, andiamo! Saltiamo in barca o in aereo Cambiamo il mondo a modo nostro

translation.en: ♪ We'll change the world The Princess way ♪
translation.it: Saltiamo in barca o in aereo Cambiamo il mondo a modo nostro

translation.en: -♪ Princesses wear pants! ♪ -♪ Yeah! ♪
♪ With the Fruitdoms in our hands ♪ ♪ These Princesses wear pants! ♪
translation.it: I Fruttami sono nelle nostre mani Principesse in pantaloni!

translation.en: [all] Princess Power!
Okay, Fussy, your "mani-purry" is done.
translation.it: Ok, Fussy, abbiamo finito la mani-purr.

translation.en: Did you say "purr-fect"? Glad we agree.
Penny darling, I was just downstairs checking in on, ah, ah!
translation.it: Penny, ero di sotto a controllare…

translation.en: Uh, I was gonna clean that up.
Penny, I'm not asking for perfection,
but yes... [chuckles] please do clean that up, and... that.
translation.it: ma sì… Sistema anche quello e questo.

translation.en: Take the mess and make it less. Consider it done.
translation.it: Sistemo in un baleno! Sarà fatto.

translation.en: Thank you.
And I've got just the thing.
My newest creation is ready!
Behold! The Super-Duper Clutter Picker-Upper!
translation.it: Ecco il mio super mega Raccogli-tutto!

translation.en: This solution will make a bubble that can pick up any mess anywhere any time.
translation.it: Crea una bolla che raccoglie tutto, ovunque e comunque.

translation.en: It'll revolutionize cleaning all over the Fruitdom!
It's unstoppable, it's unpoppable!
But not Fussy-proof. I guess it's back to the drawing board.
translation.it: Ma non a prova di Fussy. Devo perfezionarla.

translation.en: [gasps] The Charm Alarm!
Kira needs us!
-[purrs] -Come on, Fussy!
♪ Let's go, let's go Na na na na na na ♪
♪ When the trouble in our world Feels too big for one alone ♪
translation.it: Se ci sono troppi guai E da sola non ce la fai

translation.en: -♪ Yeah! ♪ -♪ Na na na na na na ♪ -♪ We jump right into action ♪ -♪ That's right! ♪
-♪ To help those in need ♪ -♪ Okay! ♪
♪ Every mistake we make ♪ -♪ Is just a step along the way ♪ -Whoo-hoo!
translation.it: A ogni errore commesso Si può rimediare

translation.en: ♪ So let's go, go, go, Come on let's take on the day ♪
translation.it: Andiamo, andiamo Dai, salviamo la giornata

translation.en: -♪ Let's take on the day ♪ -♪ Yeah! ♪ ♪ We'll just try 'til we get it right! ♪
translation.it: Salviamo la giornata, sì! Ci proveremo finché non ce la faremo!

translation.en: ♪ And never give up the fight! ♪
♪ 'Cause that's the Princess way! ♪
Princesses, I need your help!
Mr. Scrumples ran up the fireplace. He's too scared to come down and too high for me to reach him!
translation.it: Mr. Scrumples è nel camino. Ha paura di scendere, è troppo in alto.

translation.en: A trapped Teenykin?
That's a huge-ikin disaster! Of course we'll help!
translation.it: Cucciolo intrappolato? Disastro assicurato! Ti aiutiamo noi.

translation.en: We Pinkie Tea Promise to help those in need.
translation.it: Insieme aiutiamo chi è in difficoltà.

translation.en: [all] With our Princess Power, we'll always succeed!
translation.it: Unendo le forze, il successo arriverà!

translation.en: To the Kiwi Fruitdom!
[Penny] Wow, that's a big fireplace.
We're supposed to find one little hamster inside?
translation.it: Va salvato un criceto lì dentro?

translation.en: Challenge accepted.
Work with me, pal! I'm trying to get you unstuck!
Ugh, now I'm stuck too! Fireplace: one. Bea: zero.
translation.it: Ora sono bloccata qui anch'io. Camino: uno. Bea: zero.

translation.en: A little help, Princesses?
Any chance you've got a rope in that kit?
Not yet.
translation.it: No, ma ne creo una splendivolosa

translation.en: But I'll fashion up a be-dazzlous one before I can say...
translation.it: No, ma ne creo una splendivolosa in un attimo… Ta-da!

translation.en: Ta-da!
Hold on, Bea!
Nice pull, Rita.
[pants] Thanks. My fashions are fantabulous and functional.
translation.it: Grazie. Faccio creazioni fantavolose e funzionali.

translation.en: I tried, but I think Mr. Scrumples only likes you.
translation.it: Ci ho provato, ma Mr. Scrumples vuole solo te.

translation.en: Bee stings!
If I were a bird, I'd soar up and carry him out! But I can't.
translation.it: Se fossi un uccello spiccherei il volo e lo porterei fuori, ma non so volare.

translation.en: But my unstoppable, unpoppable bubble can!
translation.it: La mia bolla inarrestabile e inscoppiabile, sì!

translation.en: Your unpoppable, boppable w-w-what?
I can send a bubble up the chimney
translation.it: Mando una bolla a salvare Mr. Scrumples.

translation.en: that'll pick up Mr. Scrumples and float him out the top!
translation.it: Mando una bolla a salvare Mr. Scrumples. Uscirà da sopra.

translation.en: Then I can catch him when he comes out!
translation.it: Così io lo prendo quando esce.

translation.en: And I'll bring four extra paws so I can't miss. -Come on, Fussy. -[shrieks]
translation.it: Porto altre 4 zampe per sicurezza. Vieni, Fussy!

translation.en: This'll be my strongest bubble yet.
Heads up, Kira! It's comin'!
Let's go to the balcony and see if it works.
Fussy, do you see Mr. Scrumples? Is he close?
translation.it: Fussy, vedi Mr. Scrumples? È vicino?

translation.en: [gasps] Fussy!
Oh. The bubble got you. I'm so glad.
translation.it: La bolla ti ha preso. Meno male.

translation.en: [gasps] And now it got me!
Princesses, look!
Well, on the plus side, your bubble worked.
Too well!
We gotta stop them before they float away! Or before Fussy pops that bubble!
translation.it: Fermiamola prima che voli via o che Fussy la scoppi!

translation.en: To the Pineapple plane!
Everything looks so tiny from up here.
It's kinda soothing, don't you think?
Fussy, no! If you pop this bubble, we all fall.
translation.it: Fussy, no! Se la scoppi, precipitiamo!

translation.en: Make a beeline for that bubble!
Science snag. When we get close, the propeller blows it away!
translation.it: Problema scientifico. Se ci avviciniamo, l'elica l'allontana.

translation.en: Oh, ruffles! It's spinning out of control toward the Pineapple Fruitdom!
translation.it: Lustrini! Sta andando verso il Fruttame degli Ananas.

translation.en: Don't worry, Fussy. We're safe, I promise.
translation.it: Non temere, siamo al sicuro. Te lo prometto.

translation.en: This is an epic case of bubble trouble!
translation.it: È una bolla che non molla!

translation.en: And it's not over! Now the bubble's headed right for that pelican!
translation.it: E non è finita! Sta andando verso quel pellicano.

translation.en: Uh-oh. That pelican can burst our bubble with his beak.
Think, think, think.
If I were a bird, what would shoo me away?
A coyote!
Wait!
You don't want to peck that bubble.
You want to peck a tantalizing tuna fish tea sandwich.
translation.it: Non farla scoppiare! Non preferisci uno stuzzicante tramezzino al tonno?

translation.en: [sighs] That was too, too, too close.
And interesting. The pelican's added weight made the bubble lower a little.
translation.it: Interessante. La bolla si è abbassata col pellicano.

translation.en: So if my calculations are correct, if we add more weight to the bubble,
translation.it: Se i miei calcoli sono esatti, se aggiungiamo altro peso,

translation.en: it'll get lower and lower until it lands!
translation.it: la bolla scenderà fino ad atterrare.

translation.en: Science success!
Okay! So how do we put things in the bubble if we can't get close to it?
translation.it: Ok. Come aggiungiamo peso, se non possiamo avvicinarci?

translation.en: Oh, oh, oh! I know! It's all in the wrist. And the kit.
translation.it: Lo so! Si risolve con polso e cassetta.

translation.en: I can fashion up a be-dazzlous slingshot!
Sweet! But where do we find stuff to sling?
Check around your feet!
[gasps] This thing is loaded with stuff! Here you go, Rita!
True story: you gotta keep stuff around 'cause you'll never know when you'll have to Princess on the go.
translation.it: Meglio avere sempre scorte per improvvise missioni principesche!

translation.en: Okay, for real, those boots look so good on you.
translation.it: Ok, dico sul serio. Quegli stivali ti stanno una favola!

translation.en: It's working! Oh, but I'm out of stuff to sling!
translation.it: Funziona! Ma qui non c'è più niente!

translation.en: Me too! Everything else is bolted down.
translation.it: Già. Tutto il resto è imbullonato.

translation.en: Well, I'm not bolted down.
Penny, fly over the bubble. I'm going in!
translation.it: Penny, vola sopra la bolla. Mi lancio io!

translation.en: What? That sounds like the worst idea since socks with sandals! Are you sure?
translation.it: Cosa? È l'idea peggiore dopo i sandali coi calzini. Sei sicura?

translation.en: You got nothing to show for it if you don’t go for it.
translation.it: Non si ottiene nulla, se non si prova!

translation.en: Get ready, Bea!
One, two, three.
Go!
Ugh! Am I late for tea?
-[Fussy meows] -Oops! Sorry, Fussy.
-[meows] -Teenykin-tastic timing!
Especially since we're so low in the sky. I think we might be landing.
translation.it: Siamo così bassi che stiamo per atterrare.

translation.en: Please return your seats to their full upright position.
Gutter ball. I didn't get us low enough to land.
translation.it: Palle di pelo! Siamo ancora troppo alti!

translation.en: But Penny's bedroom is right there!
translation.it: Ma là c'è la stanza di Penny.

translation.en: And if this bubble was a puzzle piece,
translation.it: Se la bolla fosse il pezzo di un puzzle,

translation.en: it would fit right inside Penny's bedroom window!
But we're not floating towards Penny's window.
translation.it: Ma non va in quella direzione.

translation.en: We will be! Everybody, run with me!
translation.it: Ce la mandiamo. Correte tutti con me!

translation.en: For real? They're exercising now?
translation.it: Cosa? Si mettono a fare ginnastica?

translation.en: No. They're controlling the bubble's direction!
It's bubble brilliant!
Brace yourself for impact!
Three, two, one!
[Bea] Ricochet bank shot for the win!
Goal!
Game, set, and match, Bea!
Now, we can burst that bubble and set you free!
translation.it: Ora facciamo scoppiare la bolla per liberarvi!

translation.en: Wait! If you touch the bubble, you'll get pulled inside too!
translation.it: Aspetta! Se la tocchi, risucchia anche te.

translation.en: But nothing's Fussy-proof.
translation.it: Ma non è a prova di Fussy.

translation.en: It's your time to shine, Fussy!
Duck!
I think you meant "cat."
Huh. This is new.
I never know what kind of surprise I'll find in here.
At least it keeps things interesting. Hey, pelican. Boots off the bed.
translation.it: Almeno non ci si annoia. Ma niente stivali sul letto!

translation.en: Need help cleaning up, Penny? I would love some help.
translation.it: - Vuoi una mano a sistemare? - Volentieri.

translation.en: ♪ No matter what we wear We're gonna be right there ♪
translation.it: Qualsiasi cosa indossiamo Siamo sempre pronte

translation.en: -♪ Jump to it ♪ -♪ Jump to it ♪
♪ So let's suit up And save the day ♪
♪ Gowns and crowns are always fun, And when it's time to get things done ♪
translation.it: Abiti e corone sono uno spasso Ma se c'è da intervenire

translation.en: -♪ Princesses wear pants! ♪ -♪ Yeah! ♪
-♪ Let's go! ♪ -♪ Glide or sail, or hop a plane ♪
translation.it: Principesse in pantaloni! Sì, andiamo! Saltiamo in barca o in aereo Cambiamo il mondo a modo nostro

translation.en: ♪ We'll change the world The Princess way ♪
translation.it: Saltiamo in barca o in aereo Cambiamo il mondo a modo nostro

translation.en: -♪ Princesses wear pants! ♪ -♪ Yeah! ♪
♪ With the Fruitdoms in our hands ♪ ♪ These Princesses wear pants! ♪
translation.it: I Fruttami sono nelle nostre mani Principesse in pantaloni!
